imdb.title: 18If
imdb.plot: A boy named Haruto Tsukishiro falls asleep one night and becomes trapped in a dream realm, where he must battle powerful witches "people with problems" by dream hopping; while searching for a way to wake himself up.

episodes.title: The Witch of Thunder
episodes.plot: Haruto finds himself in a dream world with a talking cat and a witch whose games turn violent.

episodes.title: Time Stopped at Age 12
episodes.plot: One of the killers from a ten-year-old murder case is found dead, and now the witch that killed him is after the other perpetrators.

episodes.title: The Witch of First Love
episodes.plot: Haruto ends up in the dreams of an ailing high school girl, whom he befriends, and takes her beyond the confines of the park near her home.

episodes.title: The Witch of Gluttony
episodes.plot: After Airi is dumped by her boyfriend for a younger, thinner girl, Haruto finds himself in her dreams, where she is the queen of the Land of Donuts.

episodes.title: The Witch of Ordinariness
episodes.plot: World-class figure skater Mirei Saegusa is stressed by her current lifestyle and longs for a normal life. In the dream world, she tries to enjoy a normal life, and Haruto helps by teaching her how regular college kids have fun.

episodes.title: Curses Return Upon the Casters
episodes.plot: Natsuki Kamikawa attempts to commit suicide after being bullied, but instead of dying, she enters the world of her favorite anime, Onmyo Ukiyo Ayakashi-Barai. She is excited at first, but eventually gets sick of doing the same old anime thing.

episodes.title: And Now There Are None..
episodes.plot: Haruto and Kanzaki meet a tin man named Yoshitsune who is trying to find a girl named Nene. Just when Haruto and Kanzaki figure out that Nene is a witch, they get sucked into another dimension where Nene spends her days with two boys and a cat.

episodes.title: Threshold
episodes.plot: Haruto struggles because he can't communicate effectively with a witch. When Kanzaki asks Mari for advice about this, he comes across someone who seems to be her real-world counterpart.

episodes.title: Idols Don't Go to the Bathroom!
episodes.plot: Misaki, the center girl in the idol group Shark Lady, deals with being bullied, sexually harassed by producers, and the paparazzi. In the midst of that, she is attacked by a stalker and comes down with the Sleeping Beauty Syndrome.

episodes.title: Dream Dimension Alpha
episodes.plot: Haruto meets Jane Doe, a witch doing whatever she wants in the dream world. Haruto and the others are toyed with as they get caught up in her crazy actions and ideas.

episodes.title: The Thorn Cross Association
episodes.plot: Kanzaki hears that those with Sleeping Beauty Syndrome have been "blessed by Eve," and goes to tell Haruto that he found a clue about Yurina, but Haruto's irritated about being unable to leave the dream world and won't listen.

episodes.title: The Witch Wars
episodes.plot: The former witches who have returned to the real world look for Haruto. As the Thorn Cross Association spreads word of Eve's awakening to the world, Kanzaki's younger sister, Yurina, appears as a witch in the dream world.

episodes.title: Eve's Sigh
episodes.plot: As Eve awakens and the real world and dream world mingle together, Yuko tells Haruto a shocking truth that shakes him to the core. All the answers lie with Eve, and Haruto and the others finally open the door to meet her.
